phrs.translation: 线粒体, 粒线体, 粒腺体, 线立体
线粒体cox1基因, 绦虫属
线粒体膜电位, 线体膜电位测定, 神经细胞线粒体膜电位, 细胞线粒体膜电位
线粒体信号通路, 体路径
称线粒体基质, 粒线体基质
甘油磷酸穿梭作用, 粒线体

sentences.sentence: It is easily extracted, because it is one of a handful of genes found outside the cell nucleus, in structures called mitochondria.
sentences.translation: 它很容易提取，因为它是在细胞核之外、叫做线粒体的结构里被发现的少量基因之一。

sentences.sentence: Your body creates more and stronger mitochondria in each of your cells, making you more powerful and giving you more endurance for everything in your life!
sentences.translation: 你的身体会在每个细胞中产生更多更强的线粒体，让你更强大，让你对生活中的一切都更有耐力!

sentences.sentence: They studied the effect of phenylmethylsulfonyl fluoride, a phospholipase C inhibitor, on ischemic injury to brain mitochondria in rats.
sentences.translation: 他们研究了磷脂酶C 抑制剂苯甲基磺酰氟对大鼠脑线粒体缺血性损伤的作用。
